Job Title: Global Quality Food Expert – fresh and Ultra Fresh (m/f/d)
Job Description:
Company Description


METRO is a leading international wholesale company with food and non-food assortments that specializes in serving the needs of hotels, restaurants, and caterers (HoReCa) as well as independent traders. Around the world, METRO has some 16 million customers who can choose whether to shop in one of the large-format stores, order online and collect their purchases at the store or have them delivered. METRO also supports the competitiveness of entrepreneurs and independent businesses with digital solutions and thereby contributes to cultural diversity in retail and hospitality.

In our core wholesale business, METRO is globally represented with around 660 stores in 31 countries and generates sales of 29.8 billion Euros with approx. 95.000 employees. The headquarter is located in Düsseldorf, Germany.


Job Description
  • Development of products and their specifications for Fresh products in cooperation with suppliers, common sourcing team and own brand team
  • Organize monitoring systems (e.g.: laboratory, including sensory, testing, and assessing the results)
  • Risk assessment of products and suppliers, including HACCP
  • Review and approve label information in CS articles
  • Aligning with PC&G team the organization of sensory assessments
  • Supplier management including complaint and first point of contact for suppliers and country quality colleagues
  • Maintain data on supplier certification, inspections, product specifications and analysis results
  • Support complaints and incident management
  • Advising procurement on quality-related issues
  • Provide training for countries in his/her expertise area
  • Work with sustainability, colleagues to ensure the sustainability policies implementation in the OB articles
  • Develop and maintain the ultra-fresh supporting documents (product knowledge)
  • Managing OB meat training and capacity building for countries
  • Monitor the implantation of OB meat standard in the countries and RTO


Qualifications
  • University degree in food chemistry, food technology, Veterinarian or similar related degrees
  • Knowledge of the international OB trade
  • Good knowledge of HACCP, national and European food law
  • Good knowledge of MS office
  • Excellent English communication skills.
  • Good presentation skills - develop and present PowerPoint presentations to senior management and work in cross functional teams
  • Ability to work with data and statistics
  • Min 3 years of experience in in job related to fresh/ultra-fresh QA
  • Knowledge related to developing Fresh OB products
  • Knowledge about Ultra fresh/fresh products and products quality/food safety characteristic and EU regulations

Additional Information

  • You are part of an international and experienced team with a high degree of personal responsibility and independence in a friendly, highly dynamic and proactive environment
  • We actively support you in your professional development and promote your potential through collegial coaching and advice
